response.original_title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
response.overview: Chrissie and her friends set out on a road trip for a final fling before one is shipped off to Vietnam. Along the way, bikers harass the foursome and cause an accident that throws Chrissie from the vehicle. The lawman who arrives on the scene kills one of the bikers and brings Chrissie's friends to the Hewitt homestead, where young Leatherface is learning the tools of terror.
response.tagline: What you know about fear... doesn't even come close.
response.title: The Texas Chainsaw Massacre: The Beginning
